questions.question: A synchronous motor is a useful industrial machine on account of which of the following reasons ? \ I. It improves the power factor of the complete installation \ II. Its speed is constant at all loads, provided mains frequency remains constant III. It can always be adjusted to operate at unity power factor for optimum efficiency and economy.
In a synchronous motor if the back emf generated in the armature at no load is approximately equal to the applied voltage, then

answers.b: the excitation is said to be zero percent
answers.c: the excitation is said to be 100%
answers.d: the motor is said to be fully loaded

The constant speed of a synchronous motor can be changed to new fixed value by
A synchronous machine has its field winding on the stator and armature winding on the rotor. Under steady running conditions, the air-gap field

answers.a: rotates at synchronous speed with direction of rotation of the rotor
answers.b: remains stationary with respect to stator
answers.c: remains stationary with respect to rotor
answers.d: rotates at synchronous speed with respect to stator
